Room.Name: The Salamander's Cave
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered a large cave that is currently inhabitted by a salamander.
Room.LongDescription: The salamander is a giant, demon-like creature from the depths of the elemental plane of fire. The cave in intensely warm and feels almost like you're standing in a fire. The rest of the cave is otherwise empty and has nothing of real value. Besides, almost any object in here for more than a short period of time would probably melt or burn.
